scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && echo 'ðŸš€ Infra ready. Run npm run dev in apps/api and apps/web'
scripts.reset: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.n8n:export: docker exec -u node gen-ai-starter-kit-n8n mkdir -p /home/node/backups && docker exec -u node gen-ai-starter-kit-n8n n8n export:workflow --backup --output=/home/node/backups/ && (docker exec -u node gen-ai-starter-kit-n8n n8n export:credentials --all --encrypted --output=/home/node/backups/credentials.json || true) && docker cp gen-ai-starter-kit-n8n:/home/node/backups/. ./apps/automation/workflows/
scripts.n8n:import: docker cp ./apps/automation/workflows/. gen-ai-starter-kit-n8n:/home/node/backups/ && docker exec -u node gen-ai-starter-kit-n8n n8n import:workflow --input=/home/node/backups/ && docker exec -u node gen-ai-starter-kit-n8n n8n import:credentials --input=/home/node/backups/credentials.json
scripts.n8n:seed:save: docker exec gen-ai-starter-kit-db pg_dump -U app_user -d webapp --clean --if-exists > apps/automation/seed/init-n8n.sql
